dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4715 IH: Make Entertainment Great Again Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Onder introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To designate the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts as the Donald J. Trump Center for the Performing Arts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Make Entertainment Great Again Act of 2025 or the MEGA Act of 2025.

section.header: Designation of Donald J. Trump Center for the Performing Arts

subsection.text: The John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts shall after the date of enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Donald J. Trump Center for the Performing Arts.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts shall be considered to be a reference to the Donald J. Trump Center for the Performing Arts.
